resources.string: Login failed. Please verify your internet connection and try again. Logging in with a Google Apps email address may not work. If the error persists, please send a log to the developer.

DeskSMS will now ask you for permission to use your Google Account authentication for the purposes of push notifications and registration with our server. DeskSMS will not have access to your passwords or personal data.
You have successfully signed in!\n\nWarning: Push notifications were set up successfully, but the test push notification failed. There may be issues receiving messages via DeskSMS.
Your DeskSMS inbox is now loading.
DeskSMS was unable to log into your account. Please click to reauthenticate.
